### createDefaultPipeline() {#ae59a559d2474039c4dfb540996e84d42}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; Pipeline &gt; llvm::mca::Context::createDefaultPipeline (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mca/pipelineoptions">PipelineOptions</a> &amp; Opts, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mca/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a> &amp; SrcMgr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/custombehaviour">CustomBehaviour</a> &amp; CB)</>}>
Construct a basic pipeline for simulating an out-of-order pipeline.

This pipeline consists of Fetch, Dispatch, Execute, and Retire stages.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/context-h/#l00070">70</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/context-h">Context.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mca/context-cpp/#l00032">32</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mca/context-cpp">Context.cpp</a>.

Construct a basic pipeline for simulating an in-order pipeline.

This pipeline consists of Fetch, InOrderIssue, and Retire stages.
